comments:
After working for some time with eclipse and selecting "Run/Run..." from the
main menu (or pressing the "Run" button in the toolbar) the "Run" dialog won't
open. The .log-file shows the appended stacktrace.

After initalising a new workspace, copying all ".launch" configuration files
to \eclipse\workspace\.metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.debug.core\.launches
and restarting eclipse all works well - but only for a short time.
Than the whole story happens again.

Build-Id is 200306051737.

It looks like we cannot retrieve the IFile for a shared launch configuration.

Fixed. A core exception is now thrown when unable to retrieve the file. This 
will make the launch config fail validiation, and be "ignored" for the 
remainder of the workspace session.
Please verify, Darin (S). Changes in LaunchManager.
Ahh great ... is working well (and as expected) now.
